Post about ProRAW files using JPEG XL in iPhone 16 and Samsung Galaxy S24.

Do you know what changed under the hood to suddenly make ProRAW files 40% smaller, without any loss?

Flagship phone models like the iPhone 16 Pro and the Samsung Galaxy S24 made JPEG XL available as the payload codec to store raw camera data!

To achieve this lossless compression, JPEG XL uses its so-called modular mode. Join JPEG XL co-creator and Cloudinary senior image researcher Jon Sneyers on a deep dive into the internals of JPEG XL to better understand the key ingredients of various lossless image compression techniques.

Read more: https://okt.to/0OziME

#JPEGXL #ProRAW #ImageCompression #iPhone16 #GalaxyS24
